name: add_gas_equipment_loadto_space_type
display_name: Add Gas Equipment Loadto Space Type

arguments.name: object
arguments.display_name: Apply the Measure to a Specific Space Type or to the Entire Model

arguments.name: gas_per_space_floor_area
arguments.display_name: Gas Energy Per Space Floor Area

name_xml: Add Gas Equipment Load to Space Type
modeler_description: Currently this only works on space types, but can extend later to work on spaces that do not have a space type defined.
description: This will add a gas equipment load to the selected space types. It will borrow the schedule from the electric equipment definition in the space type with the highest peak load. If the space type doesn't have any electric equipment, then a gas load will not be added.
